title: Pakistani Finance Minister says must avoid ‘begging’ IMF, other nations for loans - ThePrint
content: Pakistani Finance Minister says must avoid ‘begging’ IMF, other nations for loans  ThePrint
description: Karachi [Pakistan], February 13 (ANI): Pakistan’s Finance Minister Shaukat Tarin on Saturday emphasised the need of reviving Pakistan’s economy in order to avoid having to “beg” for loans from the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and other nations. “We want to get out of the circle of repeatedly going to the IMF and other countries to […]
